clientId.label: Client ID
clientId.hint: Client ID configured in your GitHub account setting for this app.

clientSecret.label: Client Secret
clientSecret.hint: Client Secret configured in your GitHub account setting for this app.

doPersist.label: Persists these values
doPersist.hint: Check it if you want to persist these inputs.

repository.label: Repository (optional)
repository.hint: Target repository name with 'user/repo' format to be searched.

sortKey.label: Sort key
sortKey.hint: Select sort key of issues. Default is 'created'.

direction.label: List direction
direction.hint: Select direction of issues list which ordered by sort key. Default is 'desc'.

issueState.label: Issue state
issueState.hint: Select issue state to be shown. Default is 'all'.

since.label: Since (optional)
since.hint: Specify oldest date and time of issues to be shown.

issuesPerPages.label: Issues per pages
issuesPerPages.hint: Maximum issues shown in a page. Default is 20.
